description: Ministry of City Planning and Water Supply - Orders made to approve the acquisition of the immovable properties in Mankumban, Walani D/S Divsiion, Jaffna District for the construction under Jaffna - Kilinochchi Water Supply Scheme and in Alawathugoda, Welihelpathana, Welimada D/S Division, Badulla District for the constructions under Bogahakumbura Water Supply Scheme
